name: simpleservers
description: SimpleServers - Open-source local-first Minecraft server hosting and administration platform

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w apps/api" "npm run dev -w apps/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.desktop:build: npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web && npm run build -w apps/desktop
scripts.desktop:publish: npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web && npm run dist:publish -w apps/desktop
scripts.desktop:dev: npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/desktop && concurrently "npm run dev -w apps/web" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:5174 && cross-env SIMPLESERVERS_DESKTOP_DEV=1 VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5174 electron apps/desktop/dist/main.js"
scripts.desktop:dist: npm run desktop:build && npm run dist -w apps/desktop
scripts.test: npm run test -w apps/api && npm run test:e2e -w apps/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/api && npm run lint -w apps/web && npm run lint -w apps/desktop
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w apps/api && npm run typecheck -w apps/web && npm run typecheck -w apps/desktop
scripts.format: npm run format -w apps/api && npm run format -w apps/web && npm run format -w apps/desktop
